    Main class used to test the Course Management System

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • run

        private static void run()
        Runs a specific scenario

      • scenario1

        public static void scenario1()
        Create an instance of manager/organizer class and try loading a specific term data (there is no course data in the file).

      • scenario2

        public static void scenario2()
        1. Create an instance of manager/organizer class and load a specific term data (there should be two courses with 2 students each that is loaded). 2. Print the data that was loaded to the console.

      • scenario3

        public static void scenario3()
        1. Create an instance of manager/organizer class and load a specific term data. 2. Add new course. 3. Load students into the new course from a file. 4. Print all data to console for the new course added.

      • scenario4

        public static void scenario4()
        Try loading more than 6 courses.

      • scenario5

        public static void scenario5()
        1. Create an instance of manager/organizer class and load a specific term data 2. Try adding/loading more than allowed number of students into a class

      • scenario6

        public static void scenario6()
        1. Create an instance of manager/organizer class and load a specific term data (there should be one of each type of course with 2 students each that is loaded). 2. Generate and print to console term schedule.

      • scenario7

        public static void scenario7()
        1. Create an instance of manager/organizer class and load a specific term data (at least 2 courses) 2. Remove a course 3. Save term data to file 4. Add student to course 5. Remove different student from course 6. Modify student’s GPA for the course 7. Save term data to a different file
